name: The Fallen Era
description:
A 2D Action game where you need to defeat 3 elemental bosses in order to save the world. 

You control a character that invokes the power of his spirit to cast diferent spells  with elemental damage. If the spells are correctly performed, you can cast more powerfull spells along the time.

Made for the Global Game Jam 2016 Theme: Ritual.
